polito.uomm

Class IDM_IM

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.uni_stuttgart.informatik.canu.mobisim.core.ExtensionModule
      • de.uni_stuttgart.informatik.canu.mobisim.mobilitymodels.Movement
        • de.uni_stuttgart.informatik.canu.uomm.UserOrientedMovement
          • de.uni_stuttgart.informatik.canu.uomm.IntelligentDriverMotion
            • polito.uomm.IDM_IM
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    NotificationListener, XMLStreamable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    IDM_LC

    public class IDM_IM
extends IntelligentDriverMotion
    This class implements Intelligent Driver Motion with Intersection Management behavior. The implementation is based on M. Treiber and D. Helbing, "Explanation of Observed Features of Self-Organization in Traffic Flow", Preprint cond-mat/9901239 (1999). Original Intersection Management added.

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Marco Fiore

      Maximum deceleration factor

      True if crossing an intersection regulated by a stop sign

      Safety distance to stop from center the intersection
      protected int segmentsToIntersection
      Road segements to next ahead junction or end of the trip
      protected boolean stopManagement
      True if crossing an intersection regulated by a stop sign
      protected float stopWaitStep
      Time it takes for a vehicle to cross the intersection
      protected float stopWaitTime
      Time still to wait before crossing the intersection in presence of stop

      • act

        public int act()
        Executes the extension.

        The method is called on every simulation timestep.
        Overrides:
        act in class IntelligentDriverMotion
        Returns:
        0 - the module should be executed on next timesteps, -1 - the module should not be executed on further timesteps and should be removed from the extensions' list
